column2: ENGLISH
Begin Work to have a Child
You can seek blessing from your spouse to have a child with another party.
Surrogate Parent
You can select this person as a parent of your child.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] approaches you one day, "I want a child" [FromFrom.GetSheHe] says, "And I know how to go about it". [FromFrom.GetSheHe] goes over the idea.
I understand, let's do it my love.
I don't care, we aren't having a child!
[From.GetFirstName] has ignored your argument and refused the whole plan.
But [From.GetFirstName]... Very well...
I don't care what [From.GetFirstName] thinks, I want a child!
You plan to have a child, who with?.
My dear friend will help!
I'll pick someone from my court. Opens a diplomacy option.
Anyone will do! I just want a child.
You Know, there are many children in need of a loving home.
[From.GetFirstName] has decided to have a child despite your objection.
How can you do this, [From.GetFirstName]?
You've Decided to adopt a child
This one?
This one?
This one?
See the Girls?
You've Decided to adopt a child
This one?
This one?
This one?
See the Boys?
[From.GetFirstName] has approached you about you being a parent for [From.GetHerHis] child.
I'd love to be of help.
No I can't.
[From.GetFirstName] shutdown your plan and refused to be part.
Damn [From.GetHerHim], now I must start over.
